events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles and is now assigned for further processing.
A recruiter specialized in engineering positions has been assigned to coordinate your recruitment process.
You have successfully passed the initial screening stage based on your technical background and experience.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 14:00 UTC with the senior engineer panel.
You completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong problem solving and coding skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well and you expressed strong alignment with the company's values and work environment.
We are pleased to extend you an offer for the software engineer position with a competitive salary package.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and are considering the next steps carefully.
You have accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as a new team member.
Your onboarding process has started, including access setups and introductions to your engineering team.
The recruitment process is now complete and your hire is officially closed with all documentation finalized.
